description: Visualize OS metrics for Amazon RDS instance

targets.expr: (avg(aws_rds_database_connections_average{server_env=~"$env",region=~"$region",dbinstance_identifier=~"$db_instance"}) by (dbinstance_identifier, server_env, region) / avg(postgres_exporter_pg_settings_max_connections) by (dbinstance_identifier, server_env, region)) * 100

title: Cloudwatch RDS
